description: The optional mods that mostly just improve your experience

rules.description: Extra mods included for supporting additional resource packs and features. Usually those made for Optifine, Continuity, etc.
Support more animated textures than just items and blocks. Only useful if using specific resource packs.
Support more skyboxes from other resource packs
Support more entity features and capabilities. Fresh Moves uses these.
Extra mods included for providing more details for that extra vanilla+ feel.
Provides ambient sound effects based off what biome you're in.
Provides extra light when entities and their held items should be providing light
Extra mods included for providing assistance where it's not necessary but occassionally desired
Provides a crosshair that changes based off what actions you can perform with what you're holding and looking at
